October:     Closely Watched Trains by Bohumil Hrabel



November:     Beauty Salon by Mario Bellatin



December:     The Unbearable Lightness of Being by Milan Kundera

February:     Chinese Checkers by Mario Bellatin. Ravenna Press



March:     Senselessness by Harcio Castellanos Moya

May:     The Elegance of the Hedgehog by Muriel Barbery

July:     Under the Frog by Tibor Fisher

item.name: Reading books by international writers
